title: Black susano
author: Black susano
content: Guys this one wey all this Biafra fighter don dey show again, this time around I been  watch a short video clip for youtube dey com dey warn the newly president Tinubu and some Lagos government sectors say mak day better  QuoteRelease Nnand or we go turn Nigeria upside down [quote/] QuoteAs I dey talk like this, the post don go trending right now, com make I ask wet in be this people problems self because the way  this country dey just get as e be I com has been dey as my self y dey born me for this country sometimes But still why the Southeast geopolitical zone want mak them release this man self The matter just trie me self"iPod News | Read All The Latest News About ipob On Ripples Nigeria"  https://www.ripplesnigeria.com/tag/ipob/?ample

comments.author: Forever101
comments.body: To me, fighting solves no issue here. Let all the leaders in the East and south south work with the allocation sent to them. The northerners are better than people in the East because their state government support and care for them. They provide them social amenities, mechanized tools for farming and loans. Fighting in the East and stopping people from working will not stop a country of 36 state and FCT. The problem in the East are there leaders. If they can establish and partner with

comments.author: CryptoHeadlineNews
comments.body: Me I'm not an Igbo man, I'm not a Biafran, but I be pure  Rivers State guy, of which you no go say it's because I'm Igbo that's why i'm talking like this, but truth be told, we all know last administration was actually not fair at all to we Southerners and our Eastern brothers when it comes feeling the effect of Federal projects for the last 8yrs of Buhari in office, of which I think might have been because our region had more governors in the opposition party (i.e PDP) compared to that of the Northern & Western region whose governors were mostly A.P.C members, and as such they did actually felt the presence of Fed. Projects such goods road, constant electricity, and structural development, as the bad condition of "East-West" road in Port Harcourt, is an example to give of Fed govt negligence in this area, which was one of the reasons why Nnamdi Kanu spoke against before his arrest.Secondly, when it comes to the case of Nnamdi Kanu, I think it's high time Fed. Govt. set that man free, as I'm sure he must have learned his lessons that the Federal government is the worst set of people to ever dream of fighting with, because by leaving him there they are only giving his boys reasons to create riot and keep protesting.

comments.author: Mate2237
comments.body: Oboy dis guys e no dey ready for anything, Dem just dey disturb di government for nothing, if Dem want freedom let dem use di diplomatic way very seriously. Engaged the world community very tight, fight the Nigerian government with an idealist and realist warfare and not gorilla warfare. All these ones they are doing is a childish game they are playing. It is the innocent people that suffer the most. Let them spend money to engage UN and other organizations in the world. Call for world emergency meeting every month then the Nigerian government will know that they are serious. But this one wey Dem dey play gbangbangolo game, they are injuring themselves.Leave those people they are not ready. They are out to suffer innocent people.

comments.author: Maestro75
comments.body: Quote from: CryptoHeadlineNews on July 02, 2023, 07:07:36 AMMe I'm not an Igbo man, I'm not a Biafran, but I be pure  Rivers State guy, of which you no go say it's because I'm Igbo that's why i'm talking like this, but truth be told, we all know last administration was actually not fair at all to we Southerners and our Eastern brothers when it comes feeling the effect of Federal projects for the last 8yrs of Buhari in office, of which I think might have been because our region had more governors in the opposition party (i.e PDP) compared to that of the Northern & Western region whose governors were mostly A.P.C members, and as such they did actually felt the presence of Fed.Na true you talk there, Buhari no try for our people in the south at all. He was very mean and wicked to the region, a very retaliating president because he felt the region did not vote for him. Thank God his administration has ended and he is back to his private life. But if we check about the states weh be APC for east like Imo State, nothing weh Buhari do for there. Rochas Okorocha na APC governor but no federal presence, instead na Rochas spend state money to do federal projects. Abi na the current government of Hope Uzodinma weh still be APC but we still never see anything from the federal government. This leaders them bad gah.
